title: New: Wunder Wunder – Midnight Hours
content:
Opening with a spine tinglingly gorgeous melodic line (Is it a synth or guitar? I dunno…) Midnight Hours, the latest track from the L.

A via Melbourne outfit Wunder Wunder is a fantastic follow up to their previous track Coastline. The brainchild of Miami Horror’s Aaron Shanahan and Benjamin Plant, Wunder Wunder create psych infused pop that floats along dreamily, captivating you at every corner. Midnight Hours is the sound of a band really finding itself and honing their craft and has certainly wet my appetite for what’s to come.

Listen to Midnight Hours below and stream  their debut album over at Fader:
